title: Ancient Alien Comet 3I/ATLAS Erupts In Stunning Jet Blast As It Hurtles Toward Earth's Neighbourhood
description: Hubble, JWST, and ESA capture comet 3I/ATLAS blasting jets of gas and dust, offering scientists a rare chance to study material from beyond our Solar System.

title: Ancient well in Glasgow Cathedral 'forgotten' for years is now a shining mosaic
description: A well that has been hiding in the shadows of an ancient Glasgow Cathedral will finally be put in the spotlight after being turned into a mosaic.

title: Early morning fire destroys ancient residential building in Iseyin
description: Properties worth millions of naira have been destroyed as a result of the fire that ravaged an ancient residential building in Iseyin in Oyo State. The incident occurred in the early hours of Sunday at Ambere Koso area in lseyin. It was learnt that the fire started around 12am on Sunday and affected the third [...]Early morning fire destroys ancient residential building in Iseyin

title: Ancient Chinese Texts Reveal New Insights On Solar Eclipse And Earth's Rotation
description: The study was published in Astrophysical Journal Letters on December 2.

title: Scientists reveal a surprising new timeline for ancient Egypt
description: A new radiocarbon study has clarified the timing of the colossal Thera eruption, placing it before Egypt’s New Kingdom. Researchers analyzed artifacts tied to Pharaoh Ahmose, gaining rare access to museum materials. Their results favor a younger chronology for early 18th Dynasty Egypt. The revised timeline reshapes regional historical connections.
